How do Verus ID and NFT Marketplace, and Verus Vault work, and what are their benefits?

Verus ID and NFT Marketplace, and Verus Vault are two innovative features of the Verus ecosystem that provide unprecedented control and security over digital identities and assets.

**Verus ID and NFT Marketplace:**
The Verus ID and NFT Marketplace is a decentralized platform that enables users to buy and sell VerusIDs and NFTs (Non-Fungible Tokens) directly on the blockchain. This means that users can advertise their offers directly to the owner of an ID or NFT, or post the sale of their NFT publicly on the blockchain for everyone to see. The platform allows for completely decentralized transactions, where users can pay or offer to pay from transparent or zero-knowledge private addresses, and accept payment to either as well. The transactions are executed directly, peer-to-peer, without the need for any intermediary.

One of the benefits of this platform is that it allows owners to select and share proceeds with value-added agents, marketing organizations, or other participants in a new economy of provable digital ownership. This feature takes the VerusID, the most powerful self-sovereign identity and secure storage model for funds in the digital world, to the next level.

**Verus Vault:**
Verus Vault is an additional security feature that protects funds on a VerusID, even in the event of private key theft. When a VerusID is locked with Vault, the owner cannot spend funds from that identity until it is unlocked again. However, the owner can still stake those same funds on the Verus network and earn rewards by doing so. Additionally, the owner can still receive funds while the VerusID is locked.

It's important to note that to enable revocation, recovery, and all Verus Vault capabilities, users need to have at least one primary identity and one revocation/recovery ID configured.

The benefits of Verus Vault include:

* Enhanced security: Protects funds from theft, even if the private key is compromised.
* Flexibility: Allows owners to stake funds and earn rewards while the VerusID is locked.
* Convenience: Enables owners to receive funds while the VerusID is locked.

Overall, Verus ID and NFT Marketplace, and Verus Vault provide users with a robust and secure platform to manage their digital identities and assets, while also offering a range of benefits and features that enhance the overall user experience.

### Verus ID and NFT Marketplace
Buy and sell VerusIDs on-chain, advertising your offer directly to the owner of an ID or NFT, or posting the sale of your NFT on the worldwide blockchain for all the world to see. Execute transactions in a completely decentralized way. Pay or offer to pay from a transparent or zero-knowledge private address, still auditable by you. Accept payment to either as well, and best of all, execute your transactions directly, peer-to-peer without any intermediary necessary. Don’t worry the on-chain model still makes room for owners to select and share proceeds with value added agents, marketing organizations, or other participants in a new economy of provable digital ownership. It’s the next step in the evolution of VerusID, the most powerful self-sovereign identity and secure storage model for funds in the digital world.### Verus Vault
With Verus Vault you can now protect funds on a VerusID, even from theft of a private key! If you lock your VerusID with Vault you cannot spend funds from that identity at all until it is again unlocked. While locked, you can still stake those same funds on the Verus network and earn by doing so. Of course, you can also still receive funds.IT IS IMPORTANT TO NOTE THAT ENABLING REVOCATION, RECOVERY, AND ALL VERUS VAULT CAPABILITIES REQUIRE YOU TO HAVE ONE PRIMARY IDENTITY, AND AT LEAST ONE REVOCATION/RECOVERY ID CONFIGURED.
